abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32871607, pmid32898153, pmid32688395, pmid32956447, pmid32936438, pmid32878619, pmid32814955, pmid32591178, pmid32907666, pmid32677821, pmid32864699, pmid32951258, pmid32813298, pmid32798449, pmid32897353
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.10.19
